channel.title: Homepage of Muhammad Afifurrahman on Muhammad Afifurrahman
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage of Muhammad Afifurrahman on Muhammad Afifurrahman

item.title: Research
item.description: Research Roughly speaking, I am quite interested in discrete mathematics, especially number theory, combinatorics, and finite fields. Publications Muhammad Afifurrahman and Aleams Barra. Determining Sidon polynomials in Sidon sets over $\mathbb{F}_q \times \mathbb{F}_q$, submitted. Preprint. Muhammad Afifurrahman. On the number of different entries in involutory MDS matrices over finite fields of characteristic two, AIP Conference Proceedings 2423, 060002 (2021). Preprint. Other projects coming soon.

item.title: Education
item.description: Education PhD in Mathematics, University of New South Wales, Sydney, Australia (2022-present) Thesis topic to be determined. Advisor: Alina Ostafe & Igor Shparlinski MSc in Mathematics, Institut Teknologi Bandung, Bandung, Indonesia (2020-2021) Thesis: Polynomial Parametrization for Some Classes of Maximum Sidon Sets over Finite Fields Advisor: Aleams Barra (also well-known for his YouTube channel) BSc in Mathematics, Institut Teknologi Bandung, Bandung, Indonesia (2016-2020) Thesis: On The Number of Different Entries in Involutory MDS Matrices over Finite Fields of Characteristic Two Advisor: Aleams Barra

item.title: Activities
item.description: Research Activities Participant, Research Experience in Mathematics, HSE University, Moscow, Russia (held virtually) (2021), supervised by Ilya V. Vyugin Research assistant under various research projects in ITB, with supervisors including: Aleams Barra, Intan Muchtadi-Alamsyah, Pritta Etriana Putri. Participant, AMSI Summer School 2023 at University of Melbourne (held hybrid) (2022) Participant, International School on Algebraic Geometry and Algebraic Groups, Institute of Mathematics, VIAST (held hybrid) (2022) Participant, International School on Algebraic Geometry and Algebraic Groups, Institute of Mathematics, VIAST (held virtually) (2021) Participant, Trimester Program on Harmonic Analysis and Analytic Number Theory, Hausdorff Institute of Mathematics (held virtually) (2021) Participant, Summer School in Analytic Number Theory, Universite de Paris (held virtually) (2021) Campus Activities University of New South Wales Casual Academic, responsible for inviligating and marking some first-year courses (2022-present) Institut Teknologi Bandung Grader for various courses, including Calculus, Introduction to Real Analysis, Introduction to Complex Analysis, Elementary Linear Algebra, and Introduction to (Proof-Based) Mathematics (2018-2022) Olympiad: Assistant Tutor, Indonesia International Mathematical Olympiad Training Camp (2017-present) Freelance Mathematical Olympiad Tutor (2017-present) Research Talks MathTech 2020 , Universiti Sains Malaysia, Penang, Malaysia (virtual), 2020.

item.title: Awards and Others
item.description: Awards UNSW Tuition Fee Scholarship + Research Stipend Scholarship Holder (2022-2026 (expected)) Fast Track Program Awardee, Institut Teknologi Bandung (2020-2021) GTA 100 Scholarship Holder, Institut Teknologi Bandung (2020-2021) First Prize, International Mathematics Competition for University Students 2019 Gold Medal in Mathematics, Olimpiade Nasional Matematika & Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam 2019 Other Activities Member at Indonesian Algebra Society (2021-present) Contest Problem Proposer at Kontes Terbuka Olimpiade Matematika (2015-present) Guest Speaker at Podcast Bebas Linear (6 episodes, 2020-2021) Arranger of an Indonesian series of five talkshows on studying graduate mathematics abroad (2021-2022) Assistant for a graph theory-based board game under Aditya Purwa Santika at ITB (2020) Head of Media, Communication, and Information Division at Genshiken ITB (2018-2019) Head of Competition at MCF HIMATIKA ITB 2019 (2019) Co-founder of Pure Math Society at ITB “Purist MA LOL #makanyastrukal” (2018) Co-founder of Competitive Mathematics Society at ITB “Banceng Club” (2018)

item.title: Useful Links
item.description: Here are my English and Indonesian blogs (infrequently updated). Also, I often lurk at TVTropes. (to be developed)

item.title: Quotes
item.description: Some throwaway quotes First off, I’m not interested in ordinary people. But, if any of you are aliens, time-travelers, or espers, please come see me. That is all! - Haruhi Suzumiya Abandoning your uniqueness is equivalent to dying. - Ryou Yamada Our everyday lives, may, in fact, be a series of miracles. - Mio Naganohara
